events.title: Funk Friday Night
events.description: Get ready for the ultimate Friday night experience with the hottest Brazilian Funk beats. Our resident DJs will keep you dancing all night long with a mix of classic and contemporary funk tracks.

events.title: Trap & Bass Weekend
events.description: Experience the heaviest bass drops and trap beats in Rio's most iconic venue. Special guest DJs from Atlanta and São Paulo will bring the heat to this unforgettable weekend party.

events.title: Baile Funk Special
events.description: The authentic Baile Funk experience comes to Brasília. Dance to the rhythm of favela funk with live performances and the best DJs in the scene. This is where the real party happens.

events.title: Midnight Funk Session
events.description: An intimate late-night session featuring underground funk artists and experimental beats. Limited capacity for true funk enthusiasts only.

events.title: Trap Carnival
events.description: Trap meets carnival in this unique beachfront celebration. Watch the sunset while enjoying the best trap and hip-hop beats with your feet in the sand.

events.title: Funk & Trap Fusion
events.description: Valentine's Day special featuring the perfect blend of funk and trap. Bring your crew and celebrate love for music with this epic fusion party.

events.title: Baile do Favela
events.description: Authentic favela funk experience with local artists and traditional baile atmosphere. This is where funk was born and where it lives strongest.

events.title: Trap Kings Tour
events.description: The biggest trap event of the year featuring international headliners. Expect massive production, pyrotechnics, and the hardest trap beats you've ever heard.
